resources.string: Tweaks change how %1$s performs in various ways.\n\nAll of these options are completely optional and do not impact network or hotspot performance in any way.

When starting, %1$s sometimes has trouble if a VPN is running, and will refuse to start the hotspot until it is turned off.\n\nIf you KNOW your VPN app works fine with %1$s, turn this option on to avoid the blocking dialog.
If the %1$s hotspot has been running for 10 minutes without serving any client devices, shut it down.\n\nAutomatically shutting down the hotspot when it is not being used can save battery.

On some devices %1$s fails to launch the Proxy with an 'Invalid Argument' error. In some cases, this error is "not real" and can be recovered from by being stubborn and trying again and again.

Enabling this option lets %1$s ignore these errors and constantly keep trying. YOLO Mode.

This option is now default, and will be removed in a future update.
